name: KENNEDY IS ALIVE
description:
Dallas, Texas, November 22, 1963. President John F. Kennedy was shot in the head. Everyone thought that is was over. But the truth is different...

Created for the Holistic3D Lockdown Game jam.


(c) 2020. All assets, code and music were created by Piotr Dejong / Parallelogram Software. Additional sounds created with BFXR.
